case.state: Ooh! How exciting! A-a-ahem...hmm!
Hello! I'm Noelle: a maid in service to the Knights of Favonius.
I will protect you! Oh wait...no one needs protection, do they?
I'm... so happy you chose me to play along. I'll make sure not to disappoint you.
Sucrose!? You're here as well?!
Glad to see a fellow Mondstadt citizen among us! Let's do our best, Sucrose!
A knight! (Maybe this could be a good time to ask for advice. I'm already glad I came here.)
(That girl in the red hood...doesn't look very friendly...I'd best keep an eye on her.)
(Magma Grunt..sounds like a title than a name...she must be part of an organization then...)
That man is as big as a Fatui Legionnaire. But he seems...rather eccentric...
We may technically be opponents, Sucrose, but let's both do our best!
It's rare for us to spend time together, Sucrose, but let's make the best of it!
(She may have her own reasons for being here, likely some experiment, but will she be able to handle it...?)
A true knight is ready for anything and everything! Even stripping!
Another step in my training to become a knight: handling embarrassment and supporting others!
I've studied a fair share of card games in the Knights' Library thanks to Miss Lisa! I'm sure I'll do well! ...I hope.
No telling if we'll have to do something shameless during the next Knight exam! I... I must be prepared!
Even if this is just a small task, I'm prepared well for this: I added five games of poker before breakfast to my daily training routine.
I wonder if exchanging one card will be enough...
Just one should do.
This hand isn't any...w-wait, I change my mind!
I don't have to trade any if I don't want to, right?
~Cards.text~, if you'd be so kind, dealer.
May I have ~cards.text~ cards, please?
I'd like to request ~cards.text~ cards.
~Cards.text~, if it's alright.
Trading in these ~cards.text~ should do...
I'd like to submit these ~cards.text~.
Oh right! ~Cards.text~, dealer.
The cards are in my favor this time!
Yay!
This hand was listed as one of the stronger ones, so I'm almost definitely safe.
I feel nice and sunny right now!
Time to clean up!
I always try to give my best! As a maid and a future knight!
This isn't the best hand I could get, but I'm prepared in case it's not enough.
A middle-of-the-road hand...I'll just have to hope for the best.
This is far from an optimal hand, but neither is it bad. Maybe if I had trained more...
Just average... But, I'll do my best to make the best out of it!
My heart is racing. Could this be excitement to see the outcome of this round? Or could it be because...
I have to keep training and studying...oh, but this game does have a fair amount of luck behind it.
This is regular poker...so I can't ask for another hand, can I?
I'd rather be out in the rain than have this hand.
Worst case! How am I supposed to become a knight if I can't even succeed in a game like this?
Weren't my efforts good enough? Perhaps I should have studied more books...
I know luck is still a variable I should have taken into account, but a maid shouldn't rely on luck if it counts...
I am a disgrace to the Knights...
This is the best I could have made out of the hand I was dealt, but still it's frustrating if you can't do anything...
I should have traded more cards... Why do I always lose my head when it counts...?

condition.saying: I was wondering; is it normal that

case.state: U-uh... Well... I... Wouldn't say no to that, but I am primarily here for my training. I was fully expecting to be around more men, so my heart was better prepared for it.
(The language she's struggling with seems to be same as our own though...)
So I'm not the only one who thought that was weird...you'd think there would be more guys than just ~player~.
Perhaps its because there are so few men here that we don't see more...does that make sense?
I thought the players for the tables were chosen at random...
They suit you for sure, Sucrose. But I'm not sure I could wear something like that under my uniform... That could end up embarrassing while using the Wind Glider...
I want nothing more than to become a full fledged Knight! I've dreamed of it for so long, and I won't quit until I am one!
I-I'd like to go! (Going outside of Monstadt with the Traveler was enjoyable experience...I should try to do more adventures like that.)
I often go shopping for ingredients, and sometimes to do service on my claymore.
I'd say someone's hard work: it's very polite to laugh at someone's failures...even if it is multiple times...
It looks wonderful on you, Fluttershy! Your friend is a top-notch dressmaker!
I really like all flowers that grow in Mondstadt, but I like roses the most. But you certainly knew that before, right, Sucrose?
I'm not sure anything from Mondstadt could have prepared us for this, but that's exactly what will make this good training!
I was thinking the same thing! I'll have to clean it up after the game is over!
(Is college similar to the school Lisa attended? I'm not interested in becoming a magic user like Lisa though...)
I've actually been trying to hold back on eating so much. I know it's important to eat after exercising, but I'm always worried about putting on weight...
I don't have any siblings, but all the friends I have in Mondstadt feel like my family all the same. I'm sure you feel like that with some people, Nagisa.
Your camera is much the same as the Kamera where I come from. Do they both have the same functions?
You kind of remind of someone from the Adventurers' Guild, Basil. His name's Bennett. Happy-go-lucky as you are, but tends to be very unlucky himself.

I feel as though Miss Lisa would be good at this game for some reason. Ah, Miss Lisa is the Knights' Librarian. She's in charge of keeping the records and books in Mondstadt, but always has this relaxed air about her.
Oh no! Everyone's laundry is still on the line! May I be excused to fetch it in? ...No? V-very well.
Would anyone like some tea? I'll brew you some. Do you take sugar? One cube, or two?
Is anyone hungry? I could make some pancakes! You simply must try one, it's my specialty.
I devote myself freely to all that I do. A maid, to me, is the most liberating job there is. I'm a chef, a gardener, a warrior, a guide... I can be anything you need me to be!
This game is pretty exciting, but do I have time to spend so much time on it? ...I'll just have to double my effort for all my other tasks!
I wonder why the people in Mondstadt stopped playing cards with me? Did I do something wrong? All I wanted is to give my best. Even in a game of cards.

Hard work always pays off. If anyone wants to train with me, I can make you a workout schedule and you can accompany me on my daily routines. I usually start at 5:00 a.m., with an easy warmup of 100 sit-ups and push-ups.
My armor may not serve much purpose in terms of protection here, but a knight must always be ready for anything!
I had my armor custom made so I could still appear as a maid. It protects me and is still aesthetic. Neat, don't you think?
I may not look ready for a fight anymore, but I can still serve with everything that I have.
I was wondering; is it normal that there's only one man with us? Is this game not popular with men at all? I could have sworn men enjoy games like this...
I was wondering; is it normal that there are women among us? Is this game not popular with men at all? I could have sworn that men would prefer games like this a lot...
My armor was custom-made for me, since I'm not a Knight of Favonius. But I will be one someday!
I may look more like a maid than a Knight-in-training, but it won't put a damper on my spirits!
Armor is an important part of any Knights' equipment. Though I may not be a Knight, I must be ready for anything. It also serves as good weight training to constantly wear it.
A Vision is believed to be given to those who the gods smile upon. However, the reason is not always clear as to why, nor is the reason clear as to which element someone gets.
Still, why was I given a Geo Vision? I'm happy that it allows me to protect myself, but Geo is the farthest element from wind, or Anemo?
My turn? Let me get out of my armor. It's a lot of effort, but I can remove it quite fast.

The same goes for me, Sucrose! It's not often we're together, so we should both make the best of it. I'm not sure what kind of experiment you're doing here, but if you need me to do something, just say the word!

state.text: No, not at all! You're often in your lab, so I rarely got to see you. I don't think you have anything embarrassed about, Sucrose. They are a part of you.

case.state: It's quite alright, Sucrose! A maid aims to please! And if taking off all my armor will help you feel a little more comfortable, there's nothing more to think about!
Regarding my Vision, Sucrose? Or is it something else about me?
Ah, well, about that... I had a custom pair made for me so that they wouldn't tear no matter how much they stretched. I don't think I could deal with my hosiery tearing in public...
I... hadn't really seen the need to. But since my breasts are getting bigger, perhaps I should...
Until recently, my breasts were about your size... So I didn't really think about wearing one.
I try not to wear too much, Sucrose, so my reflexes for requests and battle are as swift as possible. This would probably be the only situation where few clothes would backfire on me...
I thought I would have done better than this, Sucrose... I studied plenty of card game books before coming here, so I was feeling fairly confident.
Well... I've haven't become a knight yet... But the Knights of Favonius are full of so many great people, and becoming a Knight is allow me to do even more!
Miss Lisa does an amazing job taking care of the Library at the Knights of Favonius Headquarters. That said, I don't ever see doing very much. She claims to be saving her strength for something...
You have maids where you come from, Jura? I hope they got as much joy as I do out of serving others.

The Knights of Favonius practice on training structures and in mock duels. However, I practiced on my on with a claymore. It took the blacksmith a number of tries before he created a sword I couldn't break though.
I-I'm not an escort, Revy; I'm a maid in service to the Knights. I'm not a Knight just yet... And what's a titjob...?
It's my turn, right? ...Oh, what do you need, Sucrose? I something the matter?
Usually my breastplate supports my chest enough too, so I don't wear anything under this shirt either...
I'm still training to be one, Petra. The next exam to become is coming up soon, so I need to be prepared for anything the exam can throw at me? I could even be a strip game like this!

200 kilos? I usually prefer sit-ups and push-ups for my training, but people always call me when they have to move heavy stuff like cargo, bookshelves and so on. I have no idea how heavy those are, though.
Don't worry about me, Fina! I don't mind fulling my duties. Sometimes I have difficulties to relax a little, though...
I may seem small, but I'm actually a knight in training and have to protect the citizens of Mondstadt from monsters and bandits. This armor is more of a symbol than for protection though.
I may be a maid, but I'm also a knight in training. This armor is a symbol of my ambition to become a full knight of the Order of Favonius.
Just one round after losing my skirt? Now people will think I'm in a hurry to lose after all. I'm actually not!
Losing twice in a row is already bad... but in a situation where I have to lose than my shirt next...
If I must, I must. As a kni... no, as a mai... no, that isn't it either...
As a dutiful maid would.
I will follow through, as a good knight should.
My last line of defense...
How unbecoming of a knight to be pushed this far...
I-I will adhere to the rules, just as I adhere to the Knight's code.
Will this mean being truly free?
I lost again? My skirt this time then... Yes, the whole skirt.
I have been doing well...perhaps it's only right that I should lose some.
If I have any hope of taking the lead, I'll have to hope for the best and better cards.
I'll catch up! That's a promise!
I may be behind now, but I'll this around...I hope.
Enticing me? What do you mean by that?
You don't feel judged by me, Sucrose, or for anyone for that matter. Walk the path that you wish to walk. Just I as will not stop to become a knight, you keep doing what you love!
Have I stripped like this? No...but if I could learn a new way of assisting others, I wouldn't say no...
You mean besides the other girls in the dressing room of the Knights of Favonius? ...Let me think about it while I get out of my skirt.
It's alright, Sucrose. I know that I gained a little weight there too. They just won't stop getting bigger...
I actually worried a lot if it would look okay without hair... Your support actually means a lot, Sucrose.
Elegant? I actually don't know if it looks better after removing my hair there, but if you say so...
I could strip those in different turns? No, I can't do that! It all counts as my armor, so it's one item after all.
My armor is just a piece of my outfit. It doesn't make me any less of knight! But it does make me look more in line with being a maid.
It's not my intention to quickly strip; my belt holds my skirt up. I can't strip them separately.
My pantyhose are flexible, ready to run, clean, whatever anyone needs!
I don't need to be careful with my pantyhose. They're made especially for me, so they're as durable as I am.
Some of the duties in Mondstadt require us to use wind gliders a lot. Without pantyhose, everyone could see... what you're about to see now.
I've done my best to keep in shape, but still... I'm still a little unsure about my body.
My armor normally gives enough support to my chest, so I usually don't wear anything under my shirt.
I did my best to keep myself tidy down here...but I'd still appreciate if you didn't stare...
I won't give up! A Knight of Favonius never gives up, even with their backs against the wall!
Special? Special how? I'm still not a Knight yet? Though I'm ready to assist anyone with anything they ask, I'm still so far from my dream.
I...can't say that I have. B-but, there's no telling what will be on the next Knight exam! I need to be prepared for anything! What if it's a matter of resolve through how far someone will strip?!
O-oh! I think I know what you mean by that. ...I never have been in such a situation before...
You think they're still okay? I sometimes wish they were as well-shaped as yours, Sucrose.
I-if you like. I actually never talked about it. Maybe that's why I'm still so unsure about it.
I see... It certainly looks tidy now, but I also liked the mature look they gave me. Should I let mine grow back too, Sucrose?
Does my headdress also count as my armor? ...Better safe than sorry! A true Knight doesn't do things by half-measures.
My Vision will have to go, too. Oh! Right! My Vision allows me to create a shield and enhance my claymore with the power of Geo -- the power of earth -- but I won't need that here.
Before, these would rip due to how much I moved around, so I had specialty ones made that can keep up with me. Doesn’t help me forget the embarrassment though…
(I hope they don't see I've gained a little weight...Even though I've kept up my training schedule every day.)
One of Mondstadt principles is the spirit of freedom...i-if I look at it that way, I don't feel so embarrassed!
I know this game is about seeing and being seen, but... Don't stare too much please... I gained a little weight after making sure all food at the last festival met my standards...
My chest was growing again lately. Probably because I was eating too much... I hope it doesn't bother you, that I'm not in perfect shape.
My hair down there always looked messy and untidy. But after I shaved, I'm not sure that was the right thing to do...
It's alright, Basil. Just get up and go again. Much like how I keep trying to be a Knight!
You're feeling warm? You're not getting sick are you, Basil? Is there anything I can do?
I know I'm here for training and to win, but better luck in the next round, ~name~.
Forgive me, ~name~, but I must win! ...Which means you'll have to lose. Sorry...
I'm a little curious as to what men wear to this sort of occasion: a lot, or a little? How about you, ~name~?
Y-you can still win, ~name~, don't give up!
~name~ lost...and all of a sudden, my body is heating up...
It's not too late...for you to win, ~name~!
I'd prefer if you'd take off some more ~name~...for one reason or another.
I'm like this, ~name~...so please, take off something that makes us feel closer...i-in pieces left!
I feel rather...excited that ~name~ lost...
Don't feel down, Sucrose! I'm right here if you need any support!
If you feel that you need a moment to calm yourself, Fluttershy, let me know. I'm at your service!
There you go, Fluttershy! I'm delighted to see you be braver!
P-please...don't give up, ~name~.
I-I may have fallen, ~name~, but that's no reason for you to follow this path as well.
~name~'s lost...
~name~ stripping is for some reason making me feel excited...
All I can do now is hope for the best...
We both must stand firm, ~name~! You'll still have to strip, unfortunately...
The cards haven't forsaken me yet! I can still win!
Find it in your heart to forgive me, ~name~. I can't afford to lose anymore.
(There's hope for a win yet!)
Even in the face of defeat, I'll fight with all I have!
Don't let this loss get you down, ~name~! There's always next time!
I made it through the round! But that means that...oh, please forgive me, ~name~...
Perhaps some tea will cheer you up, ~name~.
This is so conflicting: as a Knight, I should aim for victory, but this is a failure for me as a maid to help others... how conflicting...
(How can I best assist the one who doesn't have the best hand each round?)
~Name~ lost? I shall give you room you need to take off what you choose.
Ooh! I survived this hand! ...U-umm, forgive me, I got excited for a second.
Stand proud and firm like a knight, ~name~! Coming here is proof that you can!
Hold on...the hands are the same! The chances of a tie happening are incredibly low.
He's done wonderfully this whole time if he's only taking his ~clothing~ now...Hah, I still have so far to go...
How could I have lost by so much...? I should double my efforts from now on!
This...isn't making me feel anything right now...and my self-confidence doesn't seem to like that.
Master Jean would be so disappointed to see me lose like this...
All I can do is carry on, despite having been defeated...good luck, ~name~.
Perhaps I should pray at the Church next time for more luck next time I play.
If he's only taking off his ~clothing~ now...Perhaps ~name~ would make for a more capable knight than me...
Even if it only a little, I've still got some fight in me!
I'll try not to disgrace myself any further with more victories...so please forgive me, ~name~.
Just waiting for the chance to strike back!
Perhaps getting to this point re-enforces how good a maid I am: letting others win...
A knight doesn't give up! Even it's a small blow now, there's still a chance!
The non-essentials are usually the first to go, right?
~clothing.ifPlural(Do|Does)~ your ~clothing~ have any special meaning to you, like my roses do? If so, you maybe should keep ~clothing.ifPlural(it|them)~ and strip something bigger.
It's always the armor that takes the hit for you. Just as your ~clothing~ took the loss for you now.
It's only something small, ~name~! Don't let it get you down!
I try not to keep any small things on me; they could be lost as I'm fighting.
Knights try to keep only their essentials on them; there's no telling if they could be damaged while on patrol.
It's okay, ~name~. I'd rather focus on myself than on others right now anyway.
It doesn't look you need any assistance with something as small as your ~clothing~, right? I'm currently busy anyway...
That's good, nothing big happens right now, so I can take it easy.
No need to worry, ~name~. There is still time for me to turn it around...maybe...
He's not getting any closer to where I'm at...How embarrassing...for many reasons.
What's done is done, no use crying over it...but even so...
I still have so far to go in my training...(Should I ask ~name~ for advice?)
I'm not giving up yet, ~name~! Just like any Knight of Favonius, I'll fight to end!
I'll need to study twice as much if I'm to have a chance next time...
On to the next battle! Prepare yourself, ~name~!
Be sure to place your belongings in a place where they won't get dirty.
Perhaps I should take more small things with me the next time I play...
Your ~clothing~ suited you quite well, ~name~. But sacrifice is sometimes necessary for victory!
I wonder if Mondstadt is capable of making something like that...maybe the others could enjoy them.
I don't think I'd have anything more than I'd have on usually. I have to keep my load light, save for my sword.
Would Kaeya or any of the other Knights wear something like ~name~'s ~clothing~? I'll have to ask when I see them.
Keep your defenses up, ~name~!
To be left so defeated...disgraceful...
~Name~ would be far more ready for such a embarrassing exam than I would be...
I'll have to better next time...if I can handle next time...
I hope, you don't mind if I just continue?
Don't worry about me! I'm doing fine without any help. Please, continue the game!
Where was I...ah, yes! (I love what comes next.)
She's casting a curse?! Be careful, Nami!
It's okay, come back!
That's an interesting weapon. It can even grow smaller or bigger! How convenient! Though, why does your weapon not just appear and disappear like mine does?
Something fell out...is that a...wanted poster?!
Perhaps you should get custom-made boots, Fina. Mine always ended up worn out until I did.
Still, you can't deny that walking is great exercise!
You should be careful of accessories you take into battle, Fina. It's why I try to keep as few on me as possible.
That's an interesting accessory. I've never seen anything like an Augma before...
The technology from the city you come from must be incredible if you're describing it as such, Asuna...
Be careful not to damage the fabric of your gloves when you hold them with your teeth.
It's only something small, ~name~! Don't let it get you down!
Does that hold any special meaning to you, like my roses do? If so, you maybe should keep it and strip something bigger.
I try not to keep any small things on me; they could be lost as I'm fighting.
That's a shame... Your ~clothing~ looked good on you.
Knights try to keep only their essentials on them; there's no telling if they could be damaged while on patrol.
She's taking off her ~clothing~...perhaps I should have come with more items to give myself a better chance.
She's done so well for herself...this is unbecoming of a knight in training.
Perhaps getting to this point re-enforces how good a maid I am: letting others win...
(~Name~... I wonder if I should ask her for advice on how to do better...)
A knight doesn't give up! Even it's a small blow now, there's still a chance!
If he's only taking off his ~clothing~ now... Perhaps ~name~ would make for a more capable knight than me...
Even if it only a little, I've still got some fight in me!
I'll try not to disgrace myself any further with more victories... so please forgive me, ~name~.
Just waiting for the chance to strike back!
She's done wonderfully this whole time if he's only taking his ~clothing~ now...Hah, I still have so far to go...
How could I have lost by so much...? I should double my efforts from now on!
This...isn't making me feel anything right now...and my self-confidence doesn't seem to like that.
Master Jean would be so disappointed to see me lose like this...
All I can do is carry on, despite having been defeated...good luck, ~name~.
Perhaps I should pray at the Church next time for more luck next time I play.
It's okay, ~name~. I'd rather focus on myself than on others right now anyway.
It doesn't look you need any assistance with something as small as your ~clothing~, right? I'm currently busy anyway...
That's good, nothing big happens right now, so I can take it easy.
A pirate?! I didn't know those were around anymore...and what is that bounty?! Are you truly so evil?
Even if ears like that aren't unusual in Teyvat, yours are speical among them. I really like them as I like you, Sucrose.
Not that I couldn't fix them, but you should be careful with your stuff. If you have difficulties undressing them or anything else, you know, I'm happy to assist you.
To be left so defeated...disgraceful...
~Name~ would be far more ready for such a embarrassing exam than I would be...
I'll have to do better next time...if I can handle a next time...
Good job for doing so well, ~name~. I'll need to study up my poker game.
I think I could use something like ~name~'s clothing right now...I can't be pushed around any more.
What's done is done, no use crying over it...but even so...
I still have so far to go in my training...(Should I ask ~name~ for advice?)
I'm not giving up yet, ~name~! Just like any Knight of Favonius, I'll fight to end!
She's done much better than I have...did I not study hard enough?
I'll need to study twice as much if I'm to have a chance next time...
No need to worry, ~name~. There is still time for me to turn it around...maybe...
She's not getting any closer to where I'm at...How embarrassing...for many reasons.
On to the next battle! Prepare yourself, ~name~!
Be sure to place your belongings in a place where they won't get dirty.
Perhaps I should take more small things with me the next time I play...
Your ~clothing~ suited you quite well, ~name~. But sacrifice is sometimes necessary for victory!
I wonder if Mondstadt is capable of making something like that...maybe others could enjoy them.
I try not carry small things on me when I'm out and about. It's best to keep your load light for battle and for quick responses.
Would Amber or any of the other Knights wear something like ~name~'s ~clothing~? I'll have to ask when I see them.
Keep your defenses up, ~name~!
I hope, you don't mind if I just continue?
Don't worry about me! I'm doing fine without any help. Please, continue the game!
Where was I...ah, yes! (I love what comes next.)
I'm not blaming ~name~ for stripping his ~clothing~ now, but it had could have been earlier...
If I had done better, perhaps we'd be in each others shoes, ~name~.
~Name~ still going strong...perhaps I'm not meant to be a knight if I'm defeated so easily...
K-keep trying...~name~...
How could I have been so defeated... I was training and learning so hard for this...
You're catching up, ~name~...but that's not a good thing! ...Or is it?
Be sure to keep clothes organized, ~name~. I don't have many left to do so...
(~Name~ grows closer to my state! Though, he's still far away...from being this exposed...)
As though it weren't bad enough that I'm so close to being out...
You may have taken a loss this time ~name~, but perhaps the gods will favor you next hand.
Your ~clothing~ now, ~name~? The game seems to be picking up a little.
I don't think he'll need any privacy if he's only removing his ~clothing~ this time.
No hard battle is won easily, ~name~. Remain calm and steady. (...I should take my own advice...)
Get ready for the next round, ~name~! You've still got clothes left, so you can still fight!
While I do encourage everyone, ~name~, don't forget to keep yourself motivated to keep going!
It's just one loss, ~name~! Nothing else to do but to get up and try again! (Like I do with my exams...)
Keep faith in your luck, and it's sure to turn around!
~Name~'s ~clothing~ somehow got my interests... ~clothing.ifPlural(A-are they|I-is it)~ that special?
(Normally I don't care about my surroundings when I'm... but watching ~name~ isn't bad either...)
A-as a knight...no, as a maid, I have the duty to watch you to strip your ~clothing~...
If you have any difficulties removing any significant items, I'll gladly assist you. I would even take a break from my current task for that.
Was that all? I mean just... (Somehow I was hoping for more.)
~Name~'s only taking his ~clothing~ off now and nothing more? How...disappointing.
Good job on hanging in there, ~name~. But don't relax just yet!
That really doesn't help me at this point.
I still have so far to go...~name~ taking off her ~clothing~ only goes to reinforce that.
(Don't give up...~name~ may have only taken off his ~clothing~ just now, but it's not over...)
I'm sure ~name~ must have studied hard before coming here. Would he teach me as well?
This may be my chance to make up ground! Sorry, ~name~, but I'm not down yet!
I'm doing good so far, I just need to stay focused! ...Oh, you should stay focused too, ~name~!
As a knight, I must strive for victory, but as a maid, I'll keep hoping for your success.
You may be down now, ~name~, but there's still a battle to fight! Hang in there!
All you can do is move forward, ~name~.
The competition is heating up, ~name~! Let's do our best and face the next hand together!
I feel we've gotten a little closer, ~name~...i-in pieces left!
She...transformed into a monkey!? Incredible!
A...zombie? Someone who has already died and returned? I know there are spirits out there, but the dead can retain a body?!
What's that chirping sound?
Did you just imitate a bird, Fina?
Even I'm really happy about my Geo Vision, I always wanted to have an Anemo vision like you. I mean, Geo's the furthest thing from Anemo, and for a Knight of Favonius...
I'm not blaming ~name~ for stripping her ~clothing~ now, but it had could have been earlier...
If I had done better, perhaps we'd be in each others shoes, ~name~.
~Name~ still going strong...perhaps I'm not meant to be a knight if I'm defeated so easily...
K-keep trying...~name~...
How could I have been so defeated... I was training and learning so hard for this...
(I have to keep encouraging her...maybe it'll help me gain the confidence I need to play the next round...)
D-don't... quit... yet... ~name~...
